actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The akhlut makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail slam. It can’t make both attacks against the same target.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 +4) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Echolocation
special_abilities.desc: The akhlut can’t use its blindsight while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The akhlut can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The akhlut has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The akhlut has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the akhlut’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.
